abstract: Barclays got a big boost in its takeover battle for ABN Amro when an adviser to the Dutch Supreme Court said that it should allow the Dutch Bank to sell its Chicago-based LaSalle unit to Bank of America.
lead_paragraph: Barclays got a big boost in its takeover battle for ABN Amro when an adviser to the Dutch Supreme Court said that it should allow the Dutch Bank to sell its Chicago-based LaSalle unit to Bank of America.

headline.main: Barclays Bid Gets Boost from Court Adviser
